name: Zolo Sheet Shortcut
summary: A ZSHEET file is a shortcut used to open a Zoho Sheet spreadsheet. It was created by Zoho Docs Sync, Zoho WorkDrive Sync, or Zoho WorkDrive True Sync, when a user synced their cloud Zoho files to their PC. ZSHEET files contain only a shortcut to a spreadsheet; they do not contain the spreadsheet itself.
